query:
......

We kindly ask you to review the financial statements of the companies provided above and answer the following questions based solely on the information you have seen. If the question involves content not found in the financial statements, you may ignore this part and only answer the other parts.

Please categorize the financial reports of the companies listed above by 'Net cash flow from operating activities change compared to previous reporting period' into the following groups: high decrease (more than $(100,000,000)), medium decrease (more than $(1,000,000) and up to $(100,000,000)), low decrease (above 0 and up to $(1,000,000)). Place companies into the same collection for the same category and into different collections for different categories.
